FunctionVariables.NewTotdXaml:
<Window 
 xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
 xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
 Title="Tip of the Day" Height="700" Width="1200" Topmost="True" ResizeMode="NoResize" WindowStartupLocation="CenterScreen">
<Grid>
<Grid.Background>
<LinearGradientBrush EndPoint="0.5,1" StartPoint="0.5,0">
<GradientStop Color="#FFFDF8D5" Offset="0.99"/>
<GradientStop Color="White" Offset="0"/>
</LinearGradientBrush>
</Grid.Background>
<Label Name="lblHeader" Content="TJC Tip of the Day" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,10,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" RenderTransformOrigin="0.612,-0.735" Width="848" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" FontFamily="Imprint MT Shadow" FontSize="48" />
<Label Name="lblDate" Content="" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,83,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="448" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" FontSize="16" FontWeight="Bold" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5">
<Label.RenderTransform>
<TransformGroup>
<ScaleTransform/>
<SkewTransform/>
<RotateTransform Angle="0.472"/>
<TranslateTransform/>
</TransformGroup>
</Label.RenderTransform>
</Label>
<Label Name="lblTitle" Content="The 18” rule for storage" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,157,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" RenderTransformOrigin="0.426,-0.054" HorizontalContentAlignment="Center" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="36" Width="1057" />
<Rectangle HorizontalAlignment="Center" Height="459" Margin="0,134,0,0" Stroke="#FFB7B6B6" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="1116"/>
<TextBlock Name="txbTip" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,220,0,0" TextWrapping="Wrap" Text="" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="1056" Height="351" RenderTransformOrigin="0.493,0.204" FontSize="22"/>
<Label Content="e" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="281,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontFamily="Wingdings 2" FontSize="72" RenderTransformOrigin="0.891,-0.311"/>
<Label Content="f" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Margin="835,0,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" FontFamily="Wingdings 2" FontSize="72" RenderTransformOrigin="0.891,-0.311"/>
<Image Name="imgBulb" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Height="57" Margin="1074,157,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Width="54" Source="/lightbulb2.png"/>
<Button Name="bntOK" Content="OK" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,615,0,0" VerticalAlignment="Top" Height="30" Width="132" FontWeight="Bold" FontSize="14"/>
</Grid>
</Window>
